definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: At every stage we have to be much more subtler.
sentences.chinese: 在每一个阶段，我们必须更加精微。

sentences.english: Vulture thin chisel, in each place, its special originality can witness.
sentences.chinese: 精雕细凿，在每一个精微之处，都可见证其非凡匠心。

sentences.english: Neither at the gross level of vibra¬tion nor at the subtlest .
sentences.chinese: 不在粗钝层面的振动里，也不在最精微层面。

sentences.english: It is difficult to convey delicate shade of meaning in a translation.
sentences.chinese: 在译文中传达意义上精微的差别是很不容易的。

sentences.english: The small intestine also absorbs large quantity of liquid when it absorbing nutrients from food.
sentences.chinese: 小肠在吸收水谷精微的同时，也吸收了大量的水液。

definition: down to the smallest detail/thoroughgoing/fine and detailed
masterly/subtle and clever (or artwork, writing etc)
lit. spirit and marrow/the essential character
profound theory/philosophical theory of Wei and Jin 玄學|玄学 sect
to contain/to hold/content/(of a poem etc) full of implicit meaning
